channel.title: ICRT EZ-News
channel.description: EZNews is a Presentation of ICRT News Team, and will appear on the ICRT website daily, updated at approximately 10AM and 7PM , Monday through Friday(except holidays). This includes both the text and audio, making it easy for you to enjoy anytime.
channel.itunes:summary: EZNews is a Presentation of ICRT News Team, and will appear on the ICRT website daily, updated at approximately 10AM and 7PM , Monday through Friday(except holidays). This includes both the text and audio, making it easy for you to enjoy anytime.
channel.itunes:author: ICRT
channel.itunes:subtitle: ICRT is your number-one choice for quality music, news and entertainment in English. 台北國際社區廣播電台是提供您優質音樂，台灣國內外新聞以及娛樂訊息的最佳英語廣播電台。
channel.itunes:keywords: Taiwan_ICRT_English_Radio_ News,台灣,廣播電台,英文,英語,美語
